thread.title: Wind River
thread.title_full: Western Bikeworks reviewed by Wind River

author: Wind River
title: Wind River
text: I've placed numerous orders online and always have been100% satisfied. Western Bikeworks initially attracted me with competitive pricing which is important. I continue to buy from Western Bikeworks because in addition to competitive prices they provide excellent customer service both during the ordering phase and post sales.
